keyword: how many calories in one chicken wing
title: How Many Calories Are in One Chicken Wing?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in one chicken wing, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown, and preparation tweaks for better choices.
h1: How Many Calories Are in One Chicken Wing?
assumptions: Bone-in, skin-on, roasted; medium size (~85 g total weight, including bone).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, cooking method (baked, fried, grilled), skin inclusion, and seasonings. Check labels or sources for specifics.

quick_answer.text: One roasted chicken wing with skin provides about 99 kcal and 8 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in one chicken wing with skin?
faqs.a: About 99 kcal for one roasted, skin-on chicken wing.

faqs.q: What's the protein in one chicken wing?
faqs.a: Roughly 8.1 g protein per roasted chicken wing.
Plain roasted chicken wings have 0 g carbs.

faqs.q: How does frying affect calories in chicken wings?
faqs.a: Frying adds about 50 kcal per wing due to absorbed oil.

faqs.q: Are these calories for bone-in or boneless wings?
faqs.a: Bone-in; boneless may vary by meat weight and breading.
